00091   // Look for muSc and at least one arm
00092   AnalysedPulseList *musc;
00093   AnalysedPulseList *sir, *sil;
00094   if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("muSc")) musc = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("muSc");
00095   else return 0;
00096 
00097   if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("SiR2-F")) sir = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("SiR2-F");
00098   else sir = NULL;
00099 
00100   if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("SiL2-F")) sil = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("SiL2-F");
00101   else sil = NULL;
00102 
00103   // If neither arm had hits, there's nothing to loop through
00104   if (sil == NULL && sir == NULL) return 0;
00105 
00106   // Iterators through aforementioned vectors
00107   AnalysedPulseList::iterator cMusc;
00108   AnalysedPulseList::iterator cSiR, cSiL;
00109   cMusc = musc->begin();
00110   if (sir)
00111     cSiR = sir->begin();
00112   if (sil)
00113     cSiL = sil->begin();
00114 
00115   unsigned int iECut;
00116   double tMusc;
00117   bool bFound[15];
00118   for (; cMusc < musc->end(); ++cMusc) {
00119     tMusc = (*cMusc)->GetTime();
00120     // If there's pile-up, advance beyond it
00121     if ((cMusc+1) != musc->end() && (*(cMusc + 1))->GetTime() - tMusc < tPileUp) {
00122       ++cMusc;
00123       continue;
00124     }
00125     // Set all flags to 'not-found-yet' status
00126     for (iECut = 0; iECut < nECut; ++iECut)
00127       bFound[iECut] = false;
00128     // Advance silicon pulses beyond time of muSc
00129     if (sir)
00130       while (cSiR != sir->end() && (*cSiR)->GetTime() -tMusc < tCut[0])
00131         ++cSiR;
00132     if (sil)
00133       while (cSiL != sil->end() && (*cSiL)->GetTime() < tMusc)
00134         ++cSiL;
00135     // Check for hits
00136     if (sir)
00137       while (cSiR != sir->end() && (*cSiR)->GetTime() - tMusc < tCut[1]) {
00138         for (iECut = 0; iECut < nECut; ++iECut)
00139           if (!(bFound[iECut]))
00140             if ((*cSiR)->GetAmplitude() > eCut[iECut]) {
00141               hLifetime[iECut]->Fill((*cSiR)->GetTime() - tMusc);
00142               bFound[iECut] = true;
00143             }
00144         ++cSiR;
00145       }
00146     if (sil)
00147       while (cSiL != sil->end() && (*cSiL)->GetTime() - tMusc < tCut[1]) {
00148         for (iECut = 0; iECut < nECut; ++iECut)
00149           if (!(bFound[iECut]))
00150             if ((*cSiL)->GetAmplitude() > eCut[iECut]) {
00151               hLifetime[iECut]->Fill((*cSiL)->GetTime() - tMusc);
00152               bFound[iECut] = true;
00153             }
00154         ++cSiL;
00155       }
00156   }
00157 
00158   return 0;
00159 }
